title: Who is that one champion you hate to play against but everyone else don't seem to mind.
body:
For me it's Janna.

It makes laning with or against her so boring I would rather play against 1000 Teemos with Garen.

And so is Kennen, but to a lesser extent.

replies.body:
{{champion:77}} {{champion:106}} 

Hate them both for the same reason.

So what you are saying is that you cannot bear either one of them? Is it because they both always bear-ly win? Or because they both use their bear hands? Alright, I know those puns are bad, but just bear with me here.

Shocking as it may be, you are my spirit animal.

Fish stance, go!
http://img.gawkerassets.com/img/193ej2csv321xgif/ku-xlarge.gif
ITS SUPER EFFECTIVE!!!!!!!
http://img.4plebs.org/boards/adv/image/1413/38/1413384715428.png

> [{quoted}](name=Troy242621,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XxuAdsZf,comment-id=0013,timestamp=2015-07-30T19:20:30.764+0000)
>
> {{champion:77}} {{champion:106}} 
> 
> Hate them both for the same reason.

are they just _unbearable_???

{{champion:5}} 

I absolutely fear Xin as a laner with him jungling. All point in click so the ganks are so effective and hard to avoid.
{{champion:67}} and {{champion:92}} because i'm a low elo scrub with big ego who can't get better at this game

{{champion:99}} 

She is the one midlaner I can NEVER win lane against.

Huh, really? I can never seem to win lane with her, so I just use her as a support.

What makes her oppressive, if I may ask? o.O

Not sure. {{champion:55}} is my main midlaner so I should supposedly stomp her, but I just cant for whatever reason.

BTW, not sure {{champion:99}} {{item:3041}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3285}} with 8 kills counts as a "support" lmao jk.
lux kinda shits on kat unless you somehow manage to dodge every single E she throws at you making her waste too much mana.

{{champion:62}} 

fuck this guy, he's so hard to kill but he eats everyone alive no matter what you build

{{champion:43}} 

I mean I love playing her, but playing against her is a pain. 

Q's.

Q's everywhere.

That and her kit pretty much allows to her to adapt to almost  any situation, granted she still has mantra up.
{{champion:39}} Build Trinity into full tank, still outdamages half your team. Can trade with tanks, bruisers, mages, ADCs, and Support with ease
Why do people insist on describing a build that rushes a damage item as "full tank"?  Have they never actually seen a full tank build?

Having 4 or 5 "tank" items should be considered "full tank". I'm saying 4 or 5 because the boots can be anything, but generally Merc treads or Tabi for tanks. If I see an Irelia with 3500+ HP and about 150-200+ in both resistances, then yes, I will consider that "full tank".
{{champion:150}}... Why does he make me so angry.... why????
Erm post a gif or something describing your anger? :D *gets popcorn*
http://media.giphy.com/media/TL82qnPj3FuIo/giphy.gif

Nobody gets my main problem with this guy. Riot talked about how much Braum had to sacrifice in terms of damage, solo lane effectiveness, etc. to have his super awesome wall, but they released three months before him. To top this off they go on to say that windwall's utility to yas's team is just "added bonus"....

I hate this champ on a philosophical level.

{{champion:86}}  

It takes so much to get him low, and God forbid you get him down to 3 health because Ignite wasn't enough.
He comes back to lane, and my face:

https://wwenetworkplaylists.files.wordpress.com/2014/10/confusedcena.gif
{{champion:90}} God i hate my life
It actually kills me on the inside to see him lose lane against anyone, on either team. Because he always wins lane when I'm against him.

{{champion:75}} 

Screw this champion. It was fine back when he went Trinity first, but people have realized that defensive masteries plus a defensive item rush basically makes Nasus immoveable in-lane. Combine with point and click gank assistance, and it becomes a losing proposition to even try harassing.

It doesn't help that literally every single Nasus player I have met is an asshole.

Honer-able mention to Ali, just cause the support mastery changes made him able to spam heal, without running oom. Turning him into a disengage/engage support who also has potent sustain.

{{champion:53}}

I know I know stay out of the way blah blah blah.  My problem is that if his grab percentage is above 0.0000000% he has successfully screwed you.

{{champion:77}} 
Super annoying to play with, BS to play against.  Even worse, he fits into the "streamer/pro wannabe" category alongside Riven and Vayne, where half the players using him are just trying to [unsuccessfully] imitate Trick2G.

{{champion:31}} 
Never fricken dies!!!

The fact that no one said riven amazes me XD But for me it's got to be vayne o.o not even entirely because of her kit(still a lot due to her kit XD )... but her player base seems to be one of the most toxic in the game. (whether she's on your team, or the enemy's)

> [{quoted}](name=sickxapples,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=XxuAdsZf,comment-id=0016,timestamp=2015-07-30T19:28:16.454+0000)
>
> The fact that no one said riven amazes me XD But for me it's got to be vayne o.o not even entirely because of her kit(still a lot due to her kit XD )... but her player base seems to be one of the most toxic in the game. (whether she's on your team, or the enemy's)

That's because {{champion:67}} {{champion:92}} are hated by a lot of people, and the title says to include only those that are uncommon.
{{champion:122}} . If you go a pixel too close, ur dead

{{champion:61}} 

I can't stand her. Doesn't matter who I'm playing, I DON'T WANT THE BALL IN MY FACE GET IT AWAY
{{champion:11}} ...

{{champion:50}} 

Sooooooooooooo underestimated.

Hate Garen. 

Like dude stop fucking shouting we can hear you from across the screen smh.

zilean,

seriously, fuck zilean
stupid bombs
revives fiora every time i kill her and she gets penta
i fucking hate zilean
nerf pls

{{champion:8}} and {{champion:133}} top
God are these champions cancerous to face when you play a melee top

{{champion:68}} 

He's just obnoxious for me. Each of his (free) abilities counters a different style of play, so I never feel safe laning against this little shit.
it's funny. Rumble has had a spot in the top 3 top laners in pretty much every season of the LCS, he's pretty much immune to meta shifts, and yet you rarely see people complaining about him.
{{champion:77}}
{{champion:99}}

{{champion:23}} 

While i know he CAN be stopped. It's annoying to not get any support from your jungle to shut him down early. Especially when he can basically stay in lane longer because of his heal.
{{champion:107}} has strong sustain as well.
I fucking hate {{champion:63}} I literally hate him I hope someone dumps a bucket of water over his head and he crumbles and dies in hell

Well my most hated Champions are {{champion:238}} {{champion:105}} - so im kinda mainstream here. ^^

But there is {{champion:112}} - maybe he´s just played so rarely I have no Idea how to counter against, but every time he is picked I struggle like a bronzie! I just cant win my lane properly.... Even when I get an advantage, he still keeps oneshoting anything in Mid-Lategame! <.< 

Honorable mention: {{champion:99}} She is ok to deal with: But so many people consider her UP and unviable... thats stupid - Lux Mid-Game is insane especially with good CS. She doesnt even need kills do become a seriuos problem.
{{champion:106}}  and {{champion:50}}
